definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: Spanish unemployment soared, and the budget went into deep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙失业率飞速上升，预算陷入深深的赤字之中。

sentences.english: Sales of a variety of consumer-related products are gaining steadily.
sentences.chinese: 各种消费食品的销售在稳步上升。

sentences.english: Heavy rainfall has caused water levels of the Liujiang River to rise. (ChinaFotoPress/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 强降雨已造成了柳江的水位上升。

sentences.english: Vietnam, for example, has already been a beneficiary of escalating labor costs in China.
sentences.chinese: 例如越南已经成为了中国劳动力成为上升的受益者。

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病发病率的上升是与液体奶摄入量的增加并行的。

sentences.english: But I suppose I became interested in taking the carving to another level.
sentences.chinese: 但是我觉得我对雕刻的爱好上升到了另一层面。

sentences.english: The sludge concentration has a significant impact on membrane filtration resistance.
sentences.chinese: 污泥浓度对膜过滤阻力上升速率影响显著。

sentences.english: We’ve all heard about the Earth’s temperature rising at an alarming rate.
sentences.chinese: 我们都听说了地球的温度在以令人担忧的速度上升。

sentences.english: Shenzhen's inhabitants' blood uric acid values are showing a tendency to increase.
sentences.chinese: 深圳人血尿酸值有逐渐上升趋势。

sentences.english: If we minimize rise time we increase overshoot, and viceversa.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们减少上升时间，也就增加了过冲，反之亦然。

sentences.english: The positive and negative charges are then separated by updrafts and gravity, producing the electric field.
sentences.chinese: 正负电荷受上升气流与重力的影响而分离，产生电场。

sentences.english: Interest rates and inflation are both due to climb.
sentences.chinese: 利率和通胀率都必定上升。

sentences.english: Production goes up faster this month.
And the numbers are rising at the same time crime rates are dropping.
sentences.chinese: 被盘查的人数正在上升，同时犯罪率在下降。

sentences.english: The official death toll has also risen, to 110, 000 people.
sentences.chinese: 官方报道的死亡人口数字也已经上升到11万。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
to rise again after a fall/to pick up/rally (stock market etc)
to leap to (a higher position etc)/to jump/(of a plane) to ascend
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
